Bazar_Kori Documentation

Welcome to the Bazar_Kori documentation!

This project demonstrates a FastAPI application.

FastAPI Example Code

Here is an example FastAPI application that retrieves user information based on the user ID.

main.get_user(user_id: int)

Retrieve a user by their unique ID.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – The ID of the user to retrieve.

Returns:

A dictionary containing user information such as ID, name, and email.

Return type:

dict

Example

>>> get_user(1)
{'id': 1, 'name': 'Alice', 'email': 'alice@example.com'}
